text: The Hockey Champ is a 1939 Donald Duck short film. It was produced in Technicolor and released by Walt Disney Productions. ==Cast== * Clarence Nash as Donald Duck, Huey, Dewey, and Louie ==Home media== The short was released on May 18, 2004, on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume One: 1934-1941. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1930s comedy movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Donald Duck Category:Ice hockey movies
title: The Hockey Champ
